resources.string: Click to see my Github page

A self-taught and self-motivated developer who finds the best solutions with hard work and thinking out of the box. More than four years of experience in building, integrating, testing and supporting android applications. I like working with new technologies like BLE and i\'m working with BLE about a year now. My skills are android development and web development in java also i\'m interested in web-scraping and crawling with python. An open-minded engineer graduated from Shahroud University of Technology.
